item.description:
I'll try to keep this as non-political as possible...

If you're a fan of the constant "Bush'isms" of our president (Nu-cleee-er), or are flabergasted (or - ahem - "impressed") by the methodolgy of his thinking then you might enjoy this satirical movie (based on a true story) of our president:

Synopsis: Whether you love him or hate him, there is no question that George W. Bush is one of the most controversial public figures in recent memory. In an unprecedented undertaking, acclaimed director Oliver Stone is bringing the life of our 43rd... Whether you love him or hate him, there is no question that George W. Bush is one of the most controversial public figures in recent memory. In an unprecedented undertaking, acclaimed director Oliver Stone is bringing the life of our 43rd President to the big screen as only he can. W takes viewers through Bush’s eventful life -- his struggles and triumphs, how he found both his wife and his faith, and of course the critical days leading up to Bush’s decision to invade Iraq

There appears to only be a 6:55 PM and 10 PM showing, so we will go with the 6:55 PM showing since that is closest to the original posting time of 8PM. Meet just inside the front doors. I will give out my cell phone number on Friday to the Yes's and Maybe's. Meetup time is around 6:30


"W" Official Movie Site

"W" The Movie
item.name: "W" the movie. (about President Bush)
